name: Mojo
headline: Create animated social stories

founders.name: Jean Patry, Founder
founders.description:
• Led product for the Replay app — 'app of the year 2014' by Apple, featured in Apple Keynote & acquired by GoPro
• Worked on the GoPro mobile and Splice video editing apps
• Made the Legend app — 20M installs
• Founded the Mojo app — YC W18, 50M installs, $15M ARR, featured in 'best of apps' by Apple

## They love us!
  * Love it
I love this app so much. I can’t stop using it. Definitely increase my social media presence
🇺🇸 1111500
  * Excellent app
This app is amazing! It allows you create outstanding videos of high quality within seconds
🇬🇧 bevernage
  * I Absolutely love this App
The best app I’ve ever run across for my business. It’s absolutely amazing.
🇺🇸 TR BEAUTY
  * Amazing app!
This app has endless templates and features that are incredibly useful!!! I LOVE how easy it is to navigate, and all my posts look amazing! So many people have asked me about the app! Definitely worth the money too!
🇬🇧 lydss1111
  * Love it
Best app I tried for content got my videos looking like real adds and i get good feed back on my videos
🇺🇸 spades 485
  * Still one of the best
Long time user and Mojo is one of my preferred tools for creating commercial content for clients.
🇬🇧 sichi1020
  * Unreal
This app is fantastic for setting up posts for Instagram etc. Great if you have a business page to promote it!
🇬🇧 Staceface1
  * Hands Down the Best
This app is so good for my business I had to take the time to recommend this app to ALL business owners! Makes advertising so easy! I loooovvvveeeee this! You must get this app. The best 💃🏽
🇺🇸 Gamester Chick
  * Woah
Totally worth it. Super smooth. Very clean. Thank you.
🇺🇸 HLP 4 Life
  * Amazing App
Great app for promo and video content. Without a doubt the best app to try out.
🇺🇸 Melo025
  * Amazing app!
I manage 8 social media accounts and all my clients are happy with my work and creativity. This app has helped me run my business. I have about 12 logos uploaded. Tons of great fonts.
🇺🇸 ZuGroup


  * Ak
I’m an artist and I use this for all my marketing and I love it
🇺🇸 444 AK
  * Great App
This is one of the best apps I have ever had. This app is perfect for advertising my business in social media
🇬🇧 Milana1988
  * The best app to create stories/videos
By far one of the best apps I've ever used for creating stories, a great tool for content creators who are looking for practicality! Each new update is more complete and better!
🇧🇷 JeffersonAsg
  * Insanely easy!
Wow! If I can make gorgeous content, anyone can! This app is so incredibly easy to use, and produces such beautiful content!
🇨🇦 Heather Bolt
  * Perfect app
The app is just perfect and helps me do my work as a content creator without spending hours.
🇮🇹 urcoffeepot
  * ### So amazing and easy to use
I downloaded this app because I wanted to make my Instagram stories a bit more professional-looking. There are so many templates to choose from, if you’re looking for something simple, flashy, business-like, or something that’s just cool, you’d find it here.
🇺🇸 MyloKylo
  * Best social media related app I own
This app is INCREDIBLE. The fact that the already insane number of templates are editable to such an extent is fantastic. It has made our content look sleek and high quality. Honestly the best social editing app.
🇺🇸 ChrisPR7
  * Go to app for Stories
This is definitely my go to app for quick animated videos… freakin love it! ✌🏻😍♥️
🇺🇸 Donna from NJ
  * Better by the update
Let me just say, I’ve been using this app for about 2 years now. The creativity and improvements the developers bring to this app are honestly great. Thank you👌🏻👌🏻
🇦🇺 Yimen.k
  * Brilliant app!!
Very intuitive, great selection of effects. Perfect in every way!
🇬🇧 QubaGee
  * Absolutely in love 😍
When I started my photography business Instagram page I wanted something original to use on my stories and even on my page! I love how user-friendly it is.
🇺🇸 Asassypoet

## Social contentmade easy
### Enjoy endless creative possibilities
Choose from hundreds of animated templates designed specifically to bring your story to life
### Create outstanding content
Stand out from the crowd with high-quality layouts and animations
### Cover all your needs
Find the right templates to showcase your brand, promote your business, sell more online, and more.
# Create stunningsocial content
## Customize your needs with simple yet powerful editing
Edit as easily as you think! It takes only a few taps to move elements, change the timings, or swap the colors.
Do everything thanks to our creative library of high-quality
With our curated selection of royalty-free music tracks, stock and videos, and beautiful fonts, it’s never been simpler to find what you need.
Make your content look unique with stickers, and effects
Browse tons of effects until you find the one that fits you perfectly
  * Bokeh
  * Scratches
  * VHS


## Choose a planand get started
Upgrade your content with one of our offers
### 
Mojo free
For people wanting to make a quick project look professional. A great way to start!
Download for free  Download for free 
###

For professionals who need access to all of our templates, advanced editing features and effects to create the best quality content possible.

generated_description:
**Mojo: Making Your Stories Shine**

Mojo is a Paris-based startup that's sprouting wings in the creative content realm. Founded in 2018 as part of Y Combinator's Winter 2018 batch, Mojo has quickly staked its claim as a go-to platform for creating animated social stories. With a tight-knit team of 25 dedicated employees, the company is driven by a clear mission: to empower users with tools that turn ideas into stunning animated visuals.

### What They Do
Mojo provides an intuitive app that simplifies the process of crafting engaging social content. Whether it's Instagram stories, posts, or reels, Mojo offers hundreds of animated templates, text effects, and high-quality animations, making it easy for anyone—be it a business owner, social media manager, or casual user—to create captivating content without the complexity of traditional design software.

### Key Features
1. **User-Friendly Design**: Editing is a breeze. With a few taps, users can adjust colors, timings, and layouts.
2. **Versatile Templates**: The selection is vast, catering to various needs—showcasing brands, promoting products, or simply storytelling.
3. **Creative Library**: Included are royalty-free music tracks, beautiful fonts, stickers, and effects like VHS or bokeh.

### Plans & Pricing
Mojo operates on a freemium model:
- **Mojo Free**: Get started without any cost—ideal for quick and professional-looking projects.
- **Mojo Pro**: For those who need more robust tools and access to an extensive library.
- **Mojo Teams**: Tailored for groups that wish to collaborate seamlessly on projects.

### Community and Impact
The app has garnered a remarkable 4.9 out of 5 rating from over 840,000 users and boasts a whopping 50 million downloads. Users rave about its ease of use and the ability to elevate their social media presence dramatically. 

As Mojo continues to innovate, they're not just developing an app; they're building a community of over 30 million creators who are, day by day, making the digital space a bit more vibrant and engaging. If you're looking to supercharge your storytelling and stand out on social media, Mojo is worth the download. 

**Visit [Mojo](https://mojo-app.com) to get started today—it's free on both iOS and Android!**
